content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: SMSTDTC
      operator: empty
Core:
  Id: CORE-000109
  Version: '1'
  Status: Published
Description: Raise an error when SMSTDTC is null.
Outcome:
  Message: SMSTDTC is null.
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0547
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: The start date/time of the Disease Milestone is the
                  critical date/time, and must be populated. If the Disease Milestone
                  is an event, then the meaning of “start date” for the event may
                  need to be defined.
                Document: SDTMIG v3.4
                Section: '5.4'
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - SPECIAL-PURPOSE
  Domains:
    Include:
      - SM

json.Description: Raise an error when SMSTDTC is null.

Citations.Cited_Guidance: The start date/time of the Disease Milestone is the critical date/time, and must be populated. If the Disease Milestone is an event, then the meaning of “start date” for the event may need to be defined.
